data.name: VR Hentai 18+ Complete Edition
data.detailed_description:
By using this DLC, you can add new situations.

・The number of beautiful women will increase.
・More perverted play!
・The number of situations will increase.

Persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

This game contains explicit consensual sex scenes. The topics cover mainstream pornographic themes, such as but not limited to male/female explicit sex scenes, female/female, vaginal/oral/anal sex, toys, seduction, and consensual BDSM.
This game contains scenes of explicit violence.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content or themes that are appropriate only for adult.

Themes in this game include:
> Explicit consensual sex scenes
> Nakedness
> genitals
> lewd situations

All persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
